prompt: List all open incidents with their building names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE il.inlStatus_FRK = 1;

prompt: Show Video Loss incidents with their status and street names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, is.insName_TXT, s.strName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK JOIN Street_TBL s ON il.inlStreet_FRK = s.Street_PRK WHERE ic.incName_TXT = 'Video Loss';

prompt: Find all incidents in Rohini with their alarm messages.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlAlarmMessage_TXT, u.untUnitName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Unit_TBL u ON il.inlUnit_FRK = u.Unit_PRK WHERE u.untUnitName_TXT = 'Rohini';

prompt: Count the number of incidents by building.
completion: SELECT b.bldBuildingName_TXT, COUNT(il.IncidentLog_PRK) AS incident_count FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK GROUP BY b.bldBuildingName_TXT;

prompt: List all extra incidents with their location.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlLocation_MEM FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK WHERE ic.incName_TXT = 'extra';

prompt: Show pending incidents in Delhi with their status.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, is.insName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Street_TBL s ON il.inlStreet_FRK = s.Street_PRK JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK WHERE il.inlStatus_FRK = 3 AND s.strName_TXT = 'Delhi';

prompt: Find non-reactive incidents in Veracity Delhi.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE il.inlAlarmNonReactive_BLN = 1 AND b.bldBuildingName_TXT = 'Veracity Delhi';

prompt: List incidents with priority 1 and their status.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, is.insName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK WHERE il.inlAlarmPriority_LNG = 1;

prompt: Show incidents on test with their building names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE il.inlAlarmOnTest_BLN = 1;

prompt: Find all incidents ordered by date with their status.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlDateTime_DTM, is.insName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK ORDER BY il.inlDateTime_DTM;
